name: Most Frustrating Game Ever
description:
here is a little game Benoit Beaudet and I did as an exercise.

The goal was to create a little prototype in 4h with an unknown technology

We made this with Haxeflixel

To play: 

Unzip the folder bin>EZPlatformer

Controls: 

MOVE: arrow keys or WASD

JUMP: space bar
